text.text: Anomalocaris, a large cambrian apex predator. Found in formations across Canada, China, Greenland, Australia, and Utah. Anomalocaris ate the bottem dwelling trilobites of the Cambrian ocean. Should you find yourself infront of one, you'll find no danger.
Anomalocaris was first discovered in 1886, it was described in 1892.
Anomalocaris was 2 meters from head to tail. Trilobies and other bottom feeders were the Anomalocaris's
